T02TD2336E:299b-4: dpal ldan bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2336E:299b-5: gang zhig skyil krung gdan ldan lus kyi rgal tshigs dbyug pa rengs par ni //
T02TD2336E:299b-6: byas nas 'byung 'jug rlung dag yang dang yang du zung gi las bya ste //
T02TD2336E:299b-7: bshad pa'i gnas yongs btsum las gyen du grangs zhing ao ti y'a gnas bsdam //
T02TD2336E:299b-8: srog rnams steng du bkug nas mgrin pa'i dril chung bu gar rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2336E:299b-9: 'di ltar rlung ni sbyangs pa'i cho gas bkug pa na ni rang dbang nyid //
T02TD2336E:299b-10: thob pa rab tu byung ba gang tshe rlung ni glog dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02TD2336E:299b-11: de las de ltar dri med bde ster zla ba lce'u chung las 'bab pas //
T02TD2336E:299b-12: skams pa'i rtsa tshogs nyin dang mtshan du tshim bya de bzhin bza' bas so //
T02TD2336E:299b-13: yo ga'i bi buddha ka r'i man ngag ste /
T02TD2336E:299b-14: rgya gar shar phyogs sangga ga r'i pandi ta chen po dpal nags kyi rin po che'i spyan sngar dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur ba'o//
